title: Result of Custom Equation against Intersection of 'WITS Colombia 2009 Terrorist Incidents' and 'Dataset from 'Establecimientos Educativos Colombia 2007' with a 50km buffer'
name: Result of Custom Equation against Intersection of 'WITS Colombia 2009 Terrorist Incidents' and 'Dataset from 'Establecimientos Educativos Colombia 2007' with a 50km buffer'
description: Dataset derived by applying Refinement module/expression analysis to 'Intersection of 'WITS Colombia 2009 Terrorist Incidents' and 'Dataset from 'Establecimientos Educativos Colombia 2007' with a 50km buffer''
